overview: Hooligan stripes on jeans — is it art? And the murals on the walls of the bar? And the stickers on your skateboard? And if this is art, should an underground artist be hungry? As answers, we offer a sketch about two art punks - Frankenchain from St. Petersburg and Kirill Burygin from Moscow, who are familiar to many from the brazen and colorful design style of the projects of the Moscow Underdog bar team.
title: Low Art
